div.div:
We execute code in global execution
context by default.
Execution context is defined by Scope

switch.text: We execute code in global execution...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 104px; margin-left: 373px;

div.div:
Local execution context. Definied by
scope of function or block...

div.div:
Without Santa there is no Xmas,
without Mr. EventLooper there
is no Event Loop

switch.text: Without Santa there is no Xmas,...
